#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, i, n1, n2, flag;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		string s1, s2;
		
		cin >> s1 >> s2;
		
		n1 = s1.length();
		n2 = s2.length();
		
		if( n1 != n2 )
			printf("NO\n");
		else {
		
			vector<int> A( 128, 0 );
			
			for( i = 0; i < n1;i++ )
				A[ s1[ i ] ]++;
				
			for( i = 0; i < n1;i++ )
				A[ s2[ i ] ]--;
			
			flag = 1;
			for( i = 0;i < 128;i++ )
				if( A[ i ] ) {
					
					flag = 0;
					break;
				}
			
			if( flag )
				printf("YES\n");
			else
				printf("NO\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
